data.text: @vikkiabrahart 1/2 Hi Vikki, I'm sorry for the difficulties you experienced checking in for your flight to Bali. You may try clearing your browser's cookies and cache along with disabling your browser's pop ad blocker to ensure you have the most up to date version of our website.

@d_arbaroganista Thanks for tagging us about our checked baggage allowance. It may help to know that the maximum checked baggage allowance per passenger per flight is 40kg. No single bag must be weigh more than 32kg for safety purposes.  Thanks - Jerry
@dithabaso Hi Ditha, we’d like to further check this for you. Are you able to DM us your booking details along with your full name so we can assist. Thanks - Joie
@Hellopanda1222 That's right, Cookie! You can make unlimited changes with your booking. Just make sure that you'll do this before check in opens for your flight. Thanks - Maria
@ChuckieCh Great to hear it was sorted so efficiently! Thanks - Rochelle

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: @dithabaso Hi there, we carry mobility aids such as wheelchairs that customers require for their personal mobility, free of charge.However if you are travelling on a  Jetstar Asia (3K) flight, you will need to pay a wheelchair service and hire fee.  Thanks - Lee
@VikZeroFive Hi @VikZeroFive, Could you pls PM us with your booking reference number, so we can look into this for you. Thanks-Anu
@Shraddhagandh16 Hi Shraddha, we'd like to check this further for you. If you could send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Yen
@sweetweet213 Hi Vishnu, we'll be happy to assist with updating your name on your Club Jetstar account. Are you able to DM us your full name and email address so we can further assist. Thanks - Joie
@theartfu1doctor Hi James, Our thoughts are with you and your family during this difficult time. Jo

@kuliketikketik Hi there, thanks for your tweet. Let me assist you in updating your name in the booking. Please send us a DM with your full name and booking reference number so we can assist you. Thanks - Josh
@juanitamulyadi Hi Nita, our check-in counter opens 2 hours before departure. Thanks - Jayme
@juanitamulyadi Hi there,Thanks for your query. You can find detailed information on our website at: https://t.co/CDLhex4uZC. Thanks-Jo
@yudha_chondro Hi @yudha_chondro - you can use wireless earphones on your own personal device only. Thanks Susan
@Unknownstatus4 Hi @Unknownstatus4 - Thanks for following up. Our team member will get in contact once we have an update. Thanks Sue
@sting2music Hi there, I've responded to your DM with further details. Thanks - Lee
@ShepherdAllie Hi @shepherdAllie - if you still need us to look into your booking, you can send us a direct message and we will investigate for you! :) Thanks - Marli
@sting2music Hi there, I can appreciate how frustrating this experience must have been. Kindly DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this for you. Thanks - Joie

@petrontekiela Hi Kiela, I recognise your disappointment and I'm sorry you still have not receive your baggage or update. I've now followed up with your case so they can contact you directly as soon as possible. Thanks - Jayme

@DrRickyLee Hi Ricky, I can appreciate that you are upset that you weren't able to seat on your preferred seat. We'd like to look into this for you. Are you able to provide me your full name and booking reference via DM so we can assist? Thanks - Joie
@koolaukid Hi Scott, I’ve responded to your DM. - Mariz

data.text: @koolaukid Thanks for tagging us about your delayed baggage on your flight from Tokyo to Manila. Can you DM us your booking reference and name listed on the booking? We'd like to look into this for you. Thanks - Jerry

@khai_nour Hi Nour, Right now, I can confirm that there are no current payment outages on our end. I suggest clearing the cache and cookies or try using a different browser or device. You may also want to disable your pop ad blockers and book using incognito or safe mode on your browser.- J

@petrontekiela Thanks for tagging us, Kiela. I'm sorry to hear about your difficulties on your flight. We'd like to look into this for you, could you DM us your booking reference and name? I hope to hear from you soon. - Jerry

@NeverShoutNico Hi Nick, I can appreciate that this could be alarming on your end. However, as OTP is a security feature from your card provider, it'll be best to coordinate this directly with them. Thanks! -Kelly
@Unknownstatus4 Hi Dholakia, I recognise youre disappointment with our staff. As you have already a case open, it will be best to discuss your concerns directly with your case manager. Thanks - Jayme

@asfoorrana 2/2 However whilst our staff do their best to check customers in as quickly as possible, there can sometimes be delays. Please be assured that we take note of your feedback regarding this so we can improve our service further. Thanks - Jerry

@asfoorrana 1/2 Thanks I’m sorry to hear there was a delay in getting customers checked in on your flight. We consistently monitor our staff levels at peak periods and are training new staff to cut down on queue times.
@megng15 Hi Meg, seats are randomly assigned during online check-in. If you'd like to request a specific seat, you can purchase by logging in to our Manage Booking page. Thanks - Maria
@Unknownstatus4 Hi there, could you provide a little more info about your experience along with your booking reference and full name via DM? Thanks -Kelly

@danielagoudie Hi Daniel, thanks for your tweet. I recognise that you'd like to change your flight. If you could DM us your booking reference along with your full name, I can check this for you. Thanks - Jayme

@kris_buckham Hi Kris, I'm unable to comment about the other airlines processes but I can assure you that our Team are reviewing the situation and we'll contact affected customers directly if there's changes. Thanks - Maria
@roz_102881 Hi Roz, I’ve responded to your DM. Thanks – Lee

data.text: @kris_buckham Hi Kris, I understand that you're concerned that your flight may be affected by the airport closure. I'd recommend keeping your lines and open and you can check the status of your flight on our Flight status page here: https://t.co/G4Rl1UIkY1. Thanks - Maria

@mostgutsy Hi Katrina, I've checked the status of 3K 765 flight from Singapore to Manila for today and right now, it's still departing as scheduled. What I can advise though is for you to keep your lines open and to check on our website here: https://t.co/t8Dth14J4r Safe travels! -Kelly
@pollyywhirl Hi Polaine, I've responded to your DM. Thanks -Kelly

@mc6983 Hi Miguel, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name so we can check the status of your flight from Singapore. It may also worth noting that you can keep an eye on our Flights Status page here https://t.co/NhgmjPk4Rm. Thanks - Lee

@khrisnaina 2/2 You can check out our Flex bundle though, but it's only free of charge if you're moving the departure to another flight on the same day. You can know more here: https://t.co/2qd6z01vbW - Lindsay
@khrisnaina 1/2 Hi Krishna, if you purchase a Starter Plus or Max bundle, date changes aren't free of charge, for these fares only change fees are waived, but fare difference will still apply.
@kengoplaces If you could send us a DM, Kenneth along with your booking reference and full name so we can check this. - Mariz

data.text: @kengoplaces Hi Kenneth, thanks for the tweet. You can cancel your pre-purchased baggage allowance and meals, but these are not refundable on this occasion. Thanks - Lindsay

data.text: @akaspine Hi Agarwal, thanks for your tweet. Please note that I have responded to your post via our Jetstar Airways Twitter page. Thanks - Josh

@pvc_parfait 2/2 I also recommend that you check our Travel Alerts page via this link https://t.co/RYqD10ZWnu or you can check the real-time status of your flight via this link https://t.co/BvsWoPGXZL. Thanks - Josh

@pvc_parfait 1/2 Hi there, thanks for your tweet. Please note that all our flights to Manila is still operating as scheduled. Should there be any changes on your flight, we will let you know via SMS or email using your contact details on your booking.

@mai_tallada Thanks for replying Mai, I can assure that what you've described isn't in-line with how we train our staff. That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers. Please be assured that our feedback is essential to us for our service improvement. Thanks - Jayme

@mai_tallada Hi mai, while delays and cancellations are hard to plan for, you can be certain that our team are working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. Still, please be assured that we're using your feedback to make some important changes. Thanks - Lee

data.text: @mai_tallada Hi Mai, I recognise that your flight to Japan is delayed for almost two hours. We do our best to avoid delays, but sometimes things are out of our hands such as air traffic control. It would be best to approach one of our staff and hopefully you’ll be on your way soon. Thanks - J
@tramaineteo Hi Tramaine, could you please DM us with more info about your experience along with your booking reference and full name? We'd like to look into this for you. Thanks -Kelly
@siscanv Hi there, kindly DM us your booking reference and full name and we'll be happy to update this for you. Thanks - Yen
@siscanv Hi there! Sorry to hear that you were having a hard time contacting our call centre. Kindly DM us your concern and we'll be happy to assist you. Thanks - Yen
@raditpunakawan Hi Radit, we'd like to know more about your experience. Please DM us your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Maria

@MrSimonBower Hi Simon, I can appreciate that you are upset with the check-in line for your flight with us. We consistently monitor our staff levels at peak periods and are training new staff to cut down waiting times. We aim to check-in passengers promptly, however delays can still occur. - J
@laylalianglala Hi Layla, please resend us your info via DM so we could check this further. Thanks -Kelly
@laylalianglala Yes you can send us your query via DM. May we also get your full name for verification purposes? Thanks - Hazel
@laylalianglala Thanks for sending us a message, Layla. May I know in which channel have you sent your request so I could check? Please also provide your full name for verification. Thanks -Kelly
@WilliamNKring Hi William, we'd like to look into this for you. Please DM us the booking reference along with both the passenger's and your full name. Thanks -Kelly
@dizzynfainted Hi Ja, the social media team are only able to respond to messages in English. Are you able to repost in English so we can assist? Thanks - Cy
@Tbgapc Hi there, we'd love to have a look into this. Could you DM us your booking reference and full name? Thanks - Yen

@vvarrenmusic Hi there, thanks for your tweet. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Please send us a DM with your booking reference and full name so we can assist you now. Thanks - Lee
@saintinc Hi Joshua, we'd like to look into this for you. Please DM us your booking reference, full name and a photo of your item. Thanks -kelly
@hanarwdh Hi Hana, the number of bags wouldn't matter as long as the combined weight amounts to 20 kg in this case. Hope that helped! - Cy

@indrawankurnia Hi Indrawan, we'll be happy to assist with updating your passport details on the booking, there would be no charged for this. Please DM us your booking details along with your full name so we can update this for you. Thanks - Joie

@indrawankurnia Hi Indrawan, we'll be happy to update the passport number on the booking. Are you able to provide us your booking reference along with your full name as well as the passport details you wish to update so we can take a look at this for you. Thanks - Joie

urls.title: Carry-on baggage | What you can bring on board | Jetstar
urls.description: Everything you need to know about carry-on baggage allowances on Jetstar flights. Save on airport prices by booking in advance!

data.text: @megng15 Hey meg, yes you are allowed as long as your main item will not exceed dimensions of 56cm (H) x 36cm (W) x 23cm (D), and the other one can fit under seat. You can also check our page here for further information https://t.co/zM8khuYSyP. - Lee

@InTanMadjid Hi there, I would advise you to delete the tweet as it shows personal information such as your booking reference. Please DM us your full name and booking reference so we can further clarify your checked baggage allowance. Thanks - Joie
Jetstar Asia will fly three weekly direct services from Singapore to Hefei from 28 November. Read more about Hefei at https://t.co/f9ePM2NpH9 and book now at https://t.co/GWv1xQkLT3.

urls.title: Cheap Flights | Jetstar
urls.description: Famous low airfares. Great destinations. Discover our domestic and international network across Australia, New Zealand, Asia and the Pacific.

data.text: @ivoriemrfl Great to hear that, Ivorie! See you on-board soon :) -Kelly

@cysy25 Hi Cy, while it seems more convenient to have a Jetstar App, unfortunately, it's not yet available at this time for Philippines. However, you can always book your flights through our website :-) : https://t.co/lrzTIsqjfl Thanks - Hazel
@cysy25 Hi CY, please re-send your tweet in English so we can assist you. - Lee
@Riezna Hi Risna, I’ve responded to your DM. - Mariz

data.text: @praky4 While I appreciate that you'd like us to provide this information for the specific flight (3K522), Jetstar have no control over the availability of the aerobridge given that we are tenants of the airport, we use whatever facilities are available for us. Thanks - Hazel
@strhmaah Hi there, I've responded to your DM. Thanks - Lee
@praky4 Hi Prakash, as of this stage, we don't have any information if 3K522 has an aerobridge. Thanks - Hazel

@praky4 Hi Prakash. i understand that you're enquiring about the availability of the aerobridge at Changi airport. The availability of the aerobridge facility is not always guaranteed as it will depend on the operational requirements sorted out behind the scenes. Thanks - Hazel
@Kelboinks888 No worries, I appreciate your efforts to notify us about it. We'll take this feedback for our improvement. Thanks for sharing! - Cy
@Kelboinks888 Hi there, we’d like to have a look into this for you. If you could send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name as listed on the booking. - Mariz
@RichardAtCT That’s not the standard we set for our aircrafts but thanks for the heads up, Richard. I'll pass this to the cleaners, so hopefully you see less mess next time you fly with us! - Jerry
@AndrewTerhorst Hi Andrew, thanks for getting in touch. I recognise that you're unhappy with our customer service. Could DM us more details so I can check this for you? Thanks - Jayme
@EveliaPg Hi Eveila, we'd like to have a look on this for you. Kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Thanks -Kelly
Popular Jetstar Asia destination, Okinawa, becoming budding location for Singapore film-makers. Mediacorp new romance series to be filmed there in 2020. #Mediacorp https://t.co/aO1ad8F87l
@jureeehhh Hi Joriemay, I've responded to your DM. Thanks - Lee
@cheryblooms Hi Debi, I've responded to your DM. Kindly check your inbox. :) -Kelly
@AmeliaLiedany Hi Amelialie, please know that I've responded to your DM. Thanks - Yen
@danielwhyte Hi Daniel, we'd like to check this for you. Kindly DM us your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Yen

@Knguyentrieu Hi there, thanks for your tweet. I understand that you need an assistance about your daughter's left behind toy. Please send us a DM with your full name and booking reference number and we'll see on how we can assist you. Thanks - Josh
@bevng1971 Hi there, thanks for your message. Jetstar’s management team is always open to new ideas.  We’re always evaluating our offering - so we appreciate your comments. Thanks - Josh

@watchingyouwell Hi Lauren, I understand your disappointment however I hope you can appreciate that Jetstar has carry-on baggage rules for the safety and comfort of our customers and crew. Thanks - Lee
@blazebox Hi there, I'm sorry for the experience. Are you able to DM us further details as well as your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this for you. Thanks - Joie

@bevng1971 Hi there, thanks for replying. I sincerely understand your disappointment with our new offers and I appreciate your feedback. This will drive us to further review our services and to improve our products in the future. Thanks - Josh

@bevng1971 Hi there, if passengers don't mind being assigned a random seat, we offer the option not to purchase one. For passengers who wish to select specific seats though, charges apply. I know it's upsetting to pay for seat selection - your feedback will be used for our improvement - Cy

@clave25 Hi there, thanks for your tweet. I understand that you did not receive your boarding pass yet. Could you DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can check this for you? Thanks - Jayme
@isstyoaji Hi there, I'm really sorry if you are having difficulties connecting through our contact centre. Are you able to DM us details so we can see on how to assist you further? Thanks - Joie
@inakigcabeza Hi Iñaki, would you mind sending us a DM of your concerns so we can discuss this with you? Kindly include your booking reference and full name please. Thanks - Cy

@kathpangs Hi Tyasta, the salutation of the passenger Yohanes Pradana was already amended yesterday and we have also sent you the updated itinerary to the email nominated in the booking. Thanks - Hazel
@Galvantrix Hi Galvantrix, you can approach our lost in found at Yangon so they can assist with your boxes of cookies that were left on board. Thanks - Maria

@SeamusDebnar Hi Seamus, thanks for letting us know about this. We aim to fullfill passenger’s seating requests, however they are subject to change due to operational and safety reasons. Kindly send us a DM and we’ll like to check this for you. - Lee
@kathpangs Thanks for confirming your name, Tyasta. Would you mind sending us another DM so we could discuss this with you further? - Yen
@kathpangs Hi there, would you mind providing us your full name please?
@msrsan Hi Marko, We'd like to look into this for you. would you mind sending us your booking reference and your full name please? Thanks - H
@kathpangs Thanks for tagging us. We can definitely update this for you, just send us a DM of your booking reference and name so we can sort this out. Thanks - Jerry
